statements: DELETE FROM delivery_times WHERE route_id = 101 AND delivery_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM delivery_times WHERE delivery_id = 100 AND route_id = 25;
DELETE FROM delivery_time_data WHERE order_id = 101 AND route_id = 201
DELETE FROM route_analysis WHERE route_id = (SELECT route_id FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B');
DELETE FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' AND capacity < 500;
